name: Sky Blue Mari Project
description:
Mari, suddenlty encouter CIRRUS a magical creature from Cloud Kingdom. Mari find herself forced to help his world who may be destroyed by Dark Haze, by protecting Four Seasons Regions. when she is in Seasons Region, she transform into Sky and is able to fight Dark Haze.

Controls

Controller

  • LeftStick : Move Character
  • A : Normal Attack
  • B : Use Skill
  • X/Y : Change skill

Keyboard

  • Arrow Keys : Move Character
  • X : Normal Attack
  • C : Use Skill
  • S/D : Change skill
